mapper.select: select goods_sale_id, goods_id, company_id, goods_sale_num, goods_sale_price, goods_sale_date, pay_status from goods_sale where goods_sale_id = #{goodsSaleId}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_sale(goods_id, company_id, goods_sale_num, goods_sale_price, goods_sale_date, pay_status) values (#{goodsId}, #{companyId}, #{goodsSaleNum}, #{goodsSalePrice}, #{goodsSaleDate}, #{payStatus})

insert into goods_sale(goods_id, company_id, goods_sale_num, goods_sale_price, goods_sale_date, pay_status) values
(#{entity.goodsId}, #{entity.companyId}, #{entity.goodsSaleNum}, #{entity.goodsSalePrice}, #{entity.goodsSaleDate}, #{entity.payStatus})

insert into goods_sale(goods_id, company_id, goods_sale_num, goods_sale_price, goods_sale_date, pay_status) values
(#{entity.goodsId}, #{entity.companyId}, #{entity.goodsSaleNum}, #{entity.goodsSalePrice}, #{entity.goodsSaleDate}, #{entity.payStatus})
on duplicate key update goods_id = values(goods_id), company_id = values(company_id), goods_sale_num = values(goods_sale_num), goods_sale_price = values(goods_sale_price), goods_sale_date = values(goods_sale_date), pay_status = values(pay_status)
mapper.update:
update goods_sale
goods_id = #{goodsId},
company_id = #{companyId},
goods_sale_num = #{goodsSaleNum},
goods_sale_price = #{goodsSalePrice},
goods_sale_date = #{goodsSaleDate},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
where goods_sale_id = #{goodsSaleId}
